name: Procedural HyperActivity
description:
Procedural HyperActivity is a action/puzzle game that generate itself procedurally everytime you start a level. The goal is to land on the various platforms to activate and color them.

Realized for the ProcJam 2018 (Procedural Gamejam)

For updates, follow me on Twitter @gamedevklingon

You can also watch me coding games on twitch.tv/gamedevklingon
